sentences.english: Today is April 1. it April fool's day.
sentences.chinese: 今天是四月一號是愚人節。

sentences.english: A windy march and a rainy April makes a beautiful May.
sentences.chinese: 三月刮和風，雨下四月裏，五月風光多美麗。

sentences.english: And after April, when May follows.
sentences.chinese: 四月過去，五月接踵來到。

sentences.english: In some years, April bursts upon Virginia hills in one prodigious leap ?
sentences.chinese: 有時候，四月一個健步就躍上了弗吉尼亞的小山丘。

sentences.english: An early morning in early April, sunbeams drop on the ground like ice blades.
sentences.chinese: 四月初，早上的陽光好像冰刀，一條一條掉到地上。

sentences.english: Between the months of April to October, inland temperatures drop to as low as -60C.
sentences.chinese: 每年四月至次年十月，內陸最低氣溫可至零下60度。

sentences.english: Growth is in one long flush, beginning in April.
sentences.chinese: 成長是一個長期齊平，從四月份開始。

sentences.english: Early in April, just before a rain begins, broadcast tomato seeds.
sentences.chinese: 四月初的頭場雨前，要把西紅柿種播子下。

sentences.english: April bursts upon our Virginia hills in one prodigious leap.
sentences.chinese: 四月不知怎的一躍，就來到了弗吉尼亞的小坡上。

sentences.english: Hold me close; melt my heart like April snow.
sentences.chinese: 抱緊我，將我的心如四月融雪般化開。

sentences.english: April, come she will, when streams are rip and swelled with rain.
sentences.chinese: 四月，春潮帶雨襲來之時，她挾一段愛飄然而至。

sentences.english: The workers were hustled to finish the work before April by the master.
sentences.chinese: 老闆催他的工人在四月前完成任務。

sentences.english: April 30 he had an appointment with Bosinney to go over the accounts.
sentences.chinese: 四月三十日那一天，他跟波辛尼約好看一下帳目。

sentences.english: I want to reconfirm my reservation for Flight 911 on April first.
sentences.chinese: 我想再確認一下四月一日的911航班的預訂機票。

sentences.english: Visitor arrivals dropped by one-third between mid-March and mid-April.
sentences.chinese: 三月中至四月中期間來港旅客人數下跌三分之一。

sentences.english: In April a ship was to start for Norway, and Jurgen was to sail in it .
sentences.chinese: 四月間有一條船要開到挪威去，雨爾根也得一同去。

definition: first month of the lunar year
